title: FanFiction FanArt Winners!
body:
http://imgur.com/kznPoIN

Salutations!

We're pleased to showcase the wonderful talent of the FanFiction FanArt contest! The winners are:

Andrew Lin - refracted silence 
http://imgur.com/rHr0Ryn

Darren Yu - five things to make a shadow
http://imgur.com/smjzcjx

Tamara Davies - refracted silence 
http://imgur.com/CXYvnJG

Naomi Hermans - don't blink 
http://imgur.com/wQH55HY

Guy Briggs - diary of a shuriman merchant 
http://imgur.com/ShhcOM7

Thank you all for submitting awesome artwork, you should be receiving prizes by Tuesday next week =D

replies.body:
hi i think i got a problem
its tuesday and havent got the rp yet

probably maybe possibly bc the username i entered under was 'Seiga', but thats my current username that i changed to this year
my original username before the name change was 'Sanchudarian'

im the guy that drew the zed thing

mega thanks for this contest + the motivation to get my lazy ass drawing again lol
I will get that sorted tomorrow for you =D
u know there's this thing called deadlines... when u set them u stick to them or u end up letting down a whole bunch of people ://
You are 100% correct. prizes should be in your accounts now. Apologies for the delay.

Hi Maraudaur <3
Thank you for the winnings :) 
I just wanted to let you know that you spelt my name wrong T-T It's Tamara Davies.
Thank you again!
